about_the_game:
Game background

Chen Xi recently received a special job, shooting a set of posters with a Spring Festival atmosphere for the new movie! In order to better show the joy of the Spring Festival, she personally selected the costumes and scenes

On the day of shooting, Chen Xi was wearing a red cheongsam, standing in the quaint courtyard, with red lanterns hanging high behind her and plum blossoms

You will unlock Chen Xi's quaint illustrations through levels. These illustrations are based on the Chinese Spring Festival, showing the strong festive atmosphere and unique cultural charm of beauties dressed in traditional Chinese costumes

Can you pass the layers of tests and collect all the illustrations! ?

💞System Adjustment and New Interactive Experience💞

  • Cancel the numerical system: No longer worry about not knowing where to click, the experience is smoother.

  • Retain the interactive mode: Make your interaction with female characters more diverse.

  • Voice trigger: Different interactions have different voice responses, which increases the sense of immersion.

  • CGs with Spring Festival themes and other themes: 18 exquisite CGs, 12 Spring Festival themes and 6 other themes, bringing a visually shocking experience.

We have carefully created every scene and every plot, so that everyone can experience the most distinctive romance and sweetness in the festive atmosphere of the Spring Festival~❤️

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not suitable for all ages: revealing clothing, general adult content with concealed nudity
The game content is purely fictional and all characters are 18 years of age or older.

detailed_description:
Game background

Chen Xi recently received a special job, shooting a set of posters with a Spring Festival atmosphere for the new movie! In order to better show the joy of the Spring Festival, she personally selected the costumes and scenes

On the day of shooting, Chen Xi was wearing a red cheongsam, standing in the quaint courtyard, with red lanterns hanging high behind her and plum blossoms

You will unlock Chen Xi's quaint illustrations through levels. These illustrations are based on the Chinese Spring Festival, showing the strong festive atmosphere and unique cultural charm of beauties dressed in traditional Chinese costumes

Can you pass the layers of tests and collect all the illustrations! ?

💞System Adjustment and New Interactive Experience💞

  • Cancel the numerical system: No longer worry about not knowing where to click, the experience is smoother.

  • Retain the interactive mode: Make your interaction with female characters more diverse.

  • Voice trigger: Different interactions have different voice responses, which increases the sense of immersion.

  • CGs with Spring Festival themes and other themes: 18 exquisite CGs, 12 Spring Festival themes and 6 other themes, bringing a visually shocking experience.

We have carefully created every scene and every plot, so that everyone can experience the most distinctive romance and sweetness in the festive atmosphere of the Spring Festival~❤️
name: YUME 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: n the game, you will play the heroine Chen Xi, and control her actions through the WASD keys, while her past life memories act in the opposite direction.cleverly avoid various obstacles, solve the puzzles of the complex maze, and finally find the way to the exit!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
